issue.title: Set bitbucket build status for default and release branch builds

content.raw:
Currently we only have bitbucket build status for the `ci-pr_any` builds since there is an upstream job that gets triggered to set the build status as in-process, then a downstream job that sets the final status. Would this be easier to implement if we didn't mark the jobs as in-progress, but just mark their result when they finish? It would be really useful to have these bitbucket build status.

cc @\_jrivero_
